gurmukhi: ijs no swjn rwKsI dusmn kvn ibcwr ]
transliteration: Jis No Saajan Raakhsoo Dousman Kavan Bichaar||
translation: To whomsoever the Lord protects, the enemy can do nothing to him.

gurmukhi: CÍY n skY iqh Cwih kO inhPl jwie gvwr ]24]
transliteration: Chhvai Na Sakai Tih Chhaad(i) Kau Nihphal Jaae Gadaar||24||
translation: None can touch his shadow, the fool makes useless effort.24.

gurmukhi: jo swDU srxI pry iqn ky kvn ibcwr ]
transliteration: Jo Saabhoo Sarnoo Dare Tin Ke Kavan Bichaar||
translation: Those who have taken refuge with the saints, what can be said about them?

gurmukhi: dMq jIB ijm rwiK hY dust Airst sMGwr ]25]
transliteration: Dant Joobh Jim Raakh(i) Hai Doust Arist Sanhaar||25||
translation: God saves from the inimical and wicked persons by destroying them, just as the tongue is protected within the teeth.25.

gurmukhi: ieiq sRI bicqR nwtk gRMQy Swhzwdy v AihdIAw gmn brnnM nwm qROdsmo iDAwie smwpq msqu suB msqu ]13] APjU ]460]
transliteration: It(i) Sroo Bachitra Naatak Granthe Shaahzaade Va Aihdooaa Gadanndbarnanan Naam Traudasmo Dhiaae Samaapat Mast(u) Soubh Mast(u)||13||afjoo||460||
translation: End of the Thirteenth Chapter of BACHITTAR NATAK entitled ‘Description of the Arrival of Shahzada (the Prince) and the Officers’.13.460

gurmukhi: srb kwl sB swD aubwry ] duKu dY kY doKI sB mwry ]
transliteration: Sarab Kaal Sabh Saadh Oubhare|| Doukh(u) Dai Kai Dokhoo Sabh Mdare||
translation: At all times, the Lord protected all the saints and hath killed all the malicious persons, subjecting them to great agony.

gurmukhi: AdBuiq giq Bgqn idKrweI ] sB sMkt qy ley bcweI ]1]
transliteration: Adbhout(i) Gad(i) Bhagtan Dikhraai|| Sabh Sankat Te Lae Bachaaoo||1||
translation: He hath exhibited His marvelous State to saints and hath saved them from all sufferings.1.

gurmukhi: sB sMkt qy sMq bcwey ] sB kMtk kMtk ijm Gwey ]
transliteration: Sabh Sankat Te Sant Bachaae|| Sabh Kantak Kantak Jim Ghaae||
translation: He hath saved His saints from all sufferings. He hath destroyed all the malevolent persons like the thorns.

gurmukhi: dws jwn muih krI shwie ] Awp hwQ dY lXo bcwie ]2]
transliteration: Daas Jaan Muh(i) Daroo Sahaae|| Aap Haath Dai Layo Bachaae||2||
translation: Considering me as His Servant, He hath helped me, and hath protected me with His own hands.2.

gurmukhi: Ab jo jo mYN lKy qmwsw ] so so kro qumY Ardwsw ]
transliteration: Ab Jo Jo Main Lakhe Tamaasaa|| So So Daro Toumai Ardaasaa||
translation: All hose spectacles which have been visualized by me, I dedicate all of them to Thee.

gurmukhi: jo pRB ikrpw ktwC idKYhY ] so qv dws aucwrq jYhY ]3]
transliteration: Jo Prabh Kirpaa Kataachh Dikhaihai|| So Tav Daas Ouchaarat Jaihai||3||
translation: If Thou castest Thy Merciful glance at me, then Thy Servant shall utter all.3.
